Description: Lists information about all Compute API versions.
Lists the current absolute and rate limits for a specified project.
Lists available extensions.
Gets details about the specified extension.
Lists IDs, names, and links for all servers.
Creates a server.
Solution: Create VM + Run Container
容器支持直接修改文件
指定磁盘文件类型（ephemeral or swap）
只有一个host，不存在host调度选择
镜像需要记录实际占用大小

Description: Lists details for all servers.
Gets details for a specified server.
Updates the editable attributes of the specified server.
Solution: 刷新数据库记录

Description: Deletes a specified server.
Solution: 删除容器+虚拟机

Description: Shows metadata for a specified server.

API: Create or replace server metadata items
Description: Creates or replaces metadata items for a specified server.
Updates metadata items by key for a specified server.
Shows details for a metadata item by key for a specified server.

API: Create or update server metadata item
Description: Sets a metadata item by key for a specified server.
Deletes a metadata item by key for a specified server.
Lists networks and addresses for a specified tenant and server.
Lists addresses for a specified tenant, server, and network.
Changes the password for a server. Specify thechangePassword?action in the request body.
Reboots the specified server. Specify the?rebootaction in the request body.
Rebuilds the specified server. Specify the?rebuildaction in the request body.
Solution: 替换镜像重新创建虚拟机（如果使用volume启动虚拟机，则没有任何变化）http://blog.csdn.net/lynn_kong/article/details/9102253

Description: Resizes the specified server. Specify the?resizeaction in the request body.
Solution: 指定flavor迁移虚拟机（当前级联方案，被级联层只有一个host，此处会直接报错，需要修改nova-api代码才能支持）http://docs.openstack.org/user-guide/cli_change_the_size_of_your_server.html

Description: Confirms a pending resize action. Specify theconfirmResize?action in the request body.
Solution: 如果resize成功，虚拟机状态变为VERIFY_RESIZE，Confirm resize后，虚拟机状态变为ACTIVE

Description: Cancels and reverts a pending resize action. Specify the?revertResize?action in the request body.
Solution: 如果resize失败，可以revert resize，重新回滚

Description: Creates an image. Specify the?createImage?action in the request body.
Solution: 使用docker的导出镜像功能

Description: Gets console output for a server instance.

Solution: 默认只有管理员才能执行该操作，直接将虚拟机从磁盘上删除。

Description: Restores a deleted server.
Solution: 默认只有管理员才能执行该操作，如果nova配置了reclaim_instance_interval，则虚拟机是被假删除，在周期内还可以通过restore恢复

Description: Puts a server in rescue mode. Changes status toRESCUE.
Solution: proxy没有该接口(营救一个故障虚拟机的数据。指定密码以及营救镜像创建一个虚拟机，用这个虚拟机再去恢复数据。)

Description: Unrescues a server. Changes status to?ACTIVE.
Solution: proxy没有该接口（回滚）

Description: Shelves a running server.
Solution: proxy没有该接口（搁置一个虚拟机。停止虚拟机，并做快照）

Description: Removes an instance from the server.
Solution: proxy没有该接口（删除虚拟机）

Description: Restores a shelved server.
Solution: proxy没有该接口（恢复搁置的虚拟机）

Description: Starts a stopped server and changes its status toACTIVE.
Stops a running server and changes its status toSHUTOFF.
Gets basic usage data for a specified server.
Solution: proxy不支持

Description: Gets the administrative password for a specified server.

Clears the encrypted copy of the password in the metadata server. This is done after the client has retrieved the password and knows it doesn't need it in the metadata server anymore. The password for the server remains the same.
Solution: 清除metadata server中的administartor password
